item.title: Client Meeting #4
item.description:
Summary

  • Set up the four cameras and captured sample videos for testing the stitching algorithm.

Goals

  • Optimize stitching algorithm to work with four 4K video streams.
  • Implement output encodings to work with streaming service.

item.title: Client Meeting #3
item.description:
Summary

  • Consulting developer walked through the dev environment for web app.

Goals

  • Get the dev environment set up for all team members.
  • Get familiar with Django app structure and dev workflow.
  • Get familiar with stitching algorithm and start testing algorithm implementation with cameras.

item.title: Client Meeting #2
item.description:
Summary

  • Client laid out the project tasks and schedule.
  • Client walked through the initial designs.
  • Team gave feedback on design and client revised the designs with ideas from the team.

item.title: Team Meeting #1
item.description:
Summary

  • Established team roles and rules
  • Divided up tasks for the requirements sprint

item.title: Client Meeting #1
item.description:
Summary

  • Client gave a summary of the project.
  • Team shared previous experiences with technologies relevant to the project.
  • Client walked through a high level architecture of project.
  • Client talked through the target users.
  • Established primary channel of communications for team and client.
